TEXT.TITLE: FRANCE ANNOUNCES 10.5 BILLION FRANC T-BILL AUCTION
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of France announced that it will publicly auction 10.5 billion francs of negotiable Treasury bills on March 16. The auction will comprise 3.5 billion francs of 13-week bills, 3.5 billion francs of 26 week bills and 3.5 billion francs of 52-week bills, all fixed rate. Reuter
